channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Coming Soon & Maintenance Mode by Colorlib
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Coming Soon & Maintenance Mode by Colorlib

item.title: CVE-2022-1945|2024-08-03T00:24:42.604Z -- unknown -- coming%20soon%20%26%20maintenance%20mode%20by%20colorlib
item.description: The Coming Soon & Maintenance Mode by Colorlib WordPress plugin before 1.0.99 does not sanitize and escape some settings, allowing high privilege users such as admin to perform Stored Cross-Site Scripting when unfiltered_html is disallowed (for example in multisite setup)
